name: CrossRoad_WowieJam3_0
description:
A small mini game inspired by Jonas Tyroller and Wowie Jam announcement.

Controls are simple:

A\D - to move left & Right

Space - to Jump

Regarding assets:

Most of the assets made by Code Monkey and Music by Jonas Tyroller.

It's my second month of learning Unity and Bolt visual scripting language. I can only hope that my game idea will be clear for understanding. Perhaps i will improve it one day.

Inspired by Master Shi Heng Yi talk on TED
